description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Challenge yourself in this ultimate reaction based game! Increase your reaction speed and reflexes by playing against other gold grabbers. Beat your friends in local and live games. Will you become the Ultimate Gold Grabber?   Merry christmas and happy holidays!
